data.claim: SuperAGI MCP Server (mcp.superagi.com) implements Model Context Protocol - an open standard by Anthropic (Nov 2024) that standardizes how AI applications connect to external data sources and tools. Solves MÃ—N integration problem by creating unified API layer between LLMs and external systems.
data.snippet: MCP is an open protocol that standardizes how applications provide context to LLMs. Like USB-C for AI - provides standardized way to connect AI models to different data sources and tools.
